page.title: 09MARFLEET LANE SHOPS, HULL
page.content:
Open Mon to Sat(8-5.30)Sat close 5.30 Shop divided into butchery & bakery sections.{Pharaohs(312) }Video Shop Open Mon to Sat(until 8pm)Sun(11-5pm) 1750 VHS films,1600 BETA films.Hire cleaning tapes.3 films Â£1.50.4 films 4 days Â£2.50{Suttonway Club(Working {Men's Club) }Bingo.Members only. {Co-op(316) }Supermarket.Groceries, Frozen food.Open Mon to Sat.
Both parades have good parking facilities on the pavement.A mobile fish van sells from this space(294- 316).The two dispensing chemists rely on trade from the group practice nearby.What the smaller parade lacks in facilities,it compensates for in extended opening times.The customers are drawn from council estates on either side of Marfleet Lane and the Sutton Trust Estate.
